channel.title: Crash at initial startup
channel.description:
I installed the mod, as well as 2007 SDK and started the game up flawlessly; I went to change the resolution of the game and as soon as I did it crashed. I proceeded to start it up again but it loaded a black screen then appeared to minimize in the bottom right of my monitor and then close. I proceeded to uninstall it and reinstall it but it still gives me the same problem with the crash on the startup.
[url]https://i.imgur.com/Byoi3.jpg[/url] Picture of the crashed black screen on initial startup.
I've attempted to reinstall 2007 SDK and Mesa multiple times.

item.title: Crash at initial startup
item.dc:creator: vktech
item.description:
What are your system specs? (CPU, GPU, OS)

Try adding “+mat_forcehardwaresync 0 -dxlevel 90” to launch options.

Read full topic
